Name: Vanilla Laika
Ingredients: 15 ml Giffard Crème de Mûre liqueur
10 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Collins glass .
STRAIN into glass filled with crushed ice.
Review: Vanilla berry fruit in a tall, refreshing drink.
History: Adapted from a recipe created in 2002 by Jake Burger at Townhouse, Leeds, England. Laika was a Russian dog and the first canine in space.
Nutrition: One serving of Vanilla Laika contains 205 calories
